name: 楊哲化
objective:
(1)	應力、應變、材料的機械性質
(2)	軸向負載、扭轉、彎曲
(3)	橫向剪力、組合負載、應力轉換、應變轉換
(4)	樑與軸的設計、樑與軸的撓曲
(5)	柱的挫曲 (6)	能量法
(1)	Stress, strain, and mechanical properties of materials
(2)	 Axial load, torsion, and bending
(3)	Transverse shear, combined loadings, stress and strain transformation
(4)	Design of beams and shafts, deflection of beams and shafts
(5)	Buckling of columns
(6)	Energy methods.
schedule:
1	2/22	Introduction to Mechanics of Materials
2	3/1	Chap. 1 Stress
3	3/8	Chap. 2 Strain
4	3/15	Chap. 3 Material properties
5	3/22	Chap. 4.1~4.4 Axial loading                       Quiz 1
6	3/29	Chap. 4.5~4.8 Axial loading
7	4/5	Holliday
8	4/12	Chap. 5 Torsion
9	4/19	Midterm Exam
10	4/26	Chap. 6 Bending
11	5/3	Chap. 6 Bending
12	5/10	Chap. 7 Transverse shear
13	5/17	Chap. 8 Combined loading                         Quiz 2
14	5/24	Chap. 8 Combined loading
15	5/31	Chap. 9 Stress transformation
16	6/7	Chap. 12 Deflection of beams
17	6/14	Chap. 13 Buckling
18	6/21	Final Exam
materials: R. C. Hibbeler Mechanics of Materials. 10th edition in SI unit
